meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The puppy had a teeny tail.
meanings.sent2: I found a teeny bug on the flower.
meanings.sent3: The teeny mouse tried to climb the big tree.
meanings.sent4: Her teeny voice was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The teeny pebble sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Slightly small or diminutive in size.
meanings.sent1: She wore a teeny bow in her hair.
meanings.sent2: The teacup was teeny compared to the mug.
meanings.sent3: The teeny plant struggled to grow in the shadow.
meanings.sent4: His teeny steps echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The teeny kitten purred softly in her lap.
